extent.charseq: Kagan -- who as US solicitor general has represented the Obama administration before the high court -- would be the second justice named by Obama, after Sonia Sotomayor became the first Hispanic to reach the bench.
just one Republican joining all of Obama's Democratic allies in agreeing to refer the nomination to the full Senate, which was expected to take it up before a month-long August break
Obama's Democratic allies in agreeing to refer the nomination to the full Senate
the only member of the panel to break party ranks
the final arbiters of the US Constitution
a successor to the late Senator Robert Byrd
liberal standard bearer John Paul Stevens
the first woman dean of Harvard Law School
the temporary occupant of the White House
